channel.title: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free..."

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded: i havent listened to the latest album. year zero was like nothing but noise and anti-government propoganda. oh well

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded: Alot of bands are self selling their music now because (I forget the exact %) I think it was less then 50% of teenagers bought a CD last year so theres no need for big producers.

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded: Meh, I'm broke so I'll stick with bittorrent XD ^^

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded: If you pay $5 you can get a direct download. But otherwise, you're stuck with Bittorrent.

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded:
Is it bittorrent please tell me it's not bittorrent ; ;

darn… it's a torrent… oh well begins download…

item.title: Re: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded: For those interested, the entire album can be downloaded here for free. It's licensed under the Creative Commons Non-Commercial use license, so this distribution is completely legitimate.

item.title: Nine Inch Nails released it's new album for free...
item.content:encoded:
Well, the first 1/4th at least! They expect you'll be able to find the rest of it on the Pirate Bay as well. I bought a copy for $16.99, but the main site got hammered with 3x's the traffic they expected, so I haven't been able to download it yet. Probably tomorrow.

Anyone heard it yet?
